iNET is a leading cloud vps provider, offering reliable, scalable solutions for customers of all sizes and services. We supply all of the servers, software, bandwidth and management tools needed to run almost any web hosted application - from small to enterprise server solutions.
Our staff has over 15 years of experience in the IT field.


VPS hosting Advantages:

- High Performance SSD
- Redundant Hardware
- 24/7/365 Dedicated Support
- 100% Uptime Guarantee
- Windows Hyper-V
- Linux KVM Hypervisor
- Fast VPS Deployment
